attributes.additional_details:
Hopelessly-slow 2 Meg 'target' a 'drag' on UK-innovation; 'desk-jockeys', students & those dealing-with government no-longer-need to-attend in-person.

Australian-outback kids 'schooled' by-radio way-back in-the-1950's; in-the 21st-century 'kids' use the Internet every-day.  The ability-to view corporate 'how-to' video's gives kids-&-others an-insight into work-opportunities.

Information-exchange 'priceless'; personal 20Meg connection 'drops-out' BBC iPlayer.
